description:
After spending a few days in a Turkish village, I travelled to Cappadocia via hitchhiking and train, meeting locals along the way. This experience reminded me of rural areas in India. Places in this video - Sandikli, Dinar, Afyonkarahisar in Turkey . #turkey #TravelVlog #mountaintrekker 

# Turkey series 2022 - https://bit.ly/MTturkey2022

If you like my videos, PLEASE SHARE them and let others get inspired to explore this beautiful world. SUBSCRIBE - http://bit.ly/subscribeMT
